content.prompt: Douglass’ rhetoric in the excerpt was most likely interpreted as promoting which of the following?

choices.label: The need for more soldiers in the Union Army
His advocacy for African American equal rights
His support for Abraham Lincoln’s reelection in 1864
Criticism of the limits of the Emancipation Proclamation

topic.text: 5.9: Government Policies During the Civil War

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
